Title: The Ghost Zolotar
Descriptions:
Howdy, Partner, am I glad to see you!

I've had a special request for some pest control, but of the wolf variety.

There's been a pack of particularly vicious wolves terrorising the folks of Myshkino and this pack is led by the legendary Silver Ghost, a white wolf.

If you can wipe out the entire pack, you be doing the people of Zolotar a great service, but taking out the Ghost, their leader should be enough to scatter the rest.

Bring me the white pelt and I'll pay you â‚½6000!

Kill the Wolfs with your Crossbow and a Hunting Bolt

Travel Zolotar
Acquire white pristine wolf pelt

Travel Zolotar
Acquire white pristine wolf pelt
ObjectiveText: Travel to Zolotar and bag the pelt of The Silver Ghost in pristine condition
